short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a privacy overlay and a panic button to protect your screen content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privacy Overlay for Public Browsing is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to protect your screen content from prying eyes. Activate a semi-transparent overlay to make your screen harder to view from angles or use the panic button to instantly blur your content. Perfect for use in public spaces or open offices.
